name: No CTRL (CookieXpress)
description:
A mini project I'm working on inspired by a entry in GMTK 2020 Game Jam

Credits

Assets: Platformer Art Deluxe by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Soundtrack: City Above the Sky (Helios OST) by Alex Diggelmann (https://soundcloud.com/alexdiggelmann)

SFX: 

  1. Cartoon Spring Bounce Sound Effects by UTOOBASAURUS (ttps://youtu.be/t6KH5gwgAYE)
  2. Win Sound Effect by Listener (https://opengameart.org/content/win-sound-effect) [@listener4me on Twitter]
  3. Portal Sound by IgnasD (https://opengameart.org/content/portal-sound) [Check out their project! - www.crystalgames.space]
  4. 8bit Death Whirl by Fupi (https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-death-whirl)
